research_thread.statement: How does the C. elegans embryo determine cell fate?
research_thread.context: C. elegans has an invariant cell lineage.
research_thread.why_it_matters: Understanding the coordinate system determines which experiments are informative.

hypothesis_slate.name: Lineage-based computation
hypothesis_slate.claim: Cell fate is determined by tracking lineage history.
hypothesis_slate.mechanism: Cells maintain internal state updated at division.

hypothesis_slate.name: Gradient-based computation
hypothesis_slate.claim: Cell fate is determined by reading positional signals.

hypothesis_slate.name: Third Alternative
hypothesis_slate.claim: Both hypotheses are wrong or the dichotomy is false.
hypothesis_slate.mechanism: Could involve epigenetic memory, mechanical forces, or stochastic commitment.

discriminative_tests.name: Stage-dependent transplantation assay
discriminative_tests.procedure: Transplant cells at multiple developmental stages to ectopic positions.
discriminative_tests.potency_check: Include late-stage transplants as positive control.

discriminative_tests.name: Morphogen source ablation
discriminative_tests.procedure: Laser-ablate cells that produce candidate morphogens.
discriminative_tests.potency_check: Verify gradient disruption via reporter imaging.

assumption_ledger.name: Invariant lineage is reproducible
assumption_ledger.statement: Every wild-type C. elegans embryo follows the same division pattern.
assumption_ledger.load: If wrong, transplant results aren't generalizable.

assumption_ledger.name: Cell identity is stable post-commitment
assumption_ledger.load: If wrong, transplant assays become uninterpretable.

assumption_ledger.name: Scale check: diffusion vs cell cycle
assumption_ledger.statement: Morphogen diffusion must be fast enough relative to cell cycle.
assumption_ledger.calculation: D ~ 10 um^2/s, L ~ 50 um => tau = L^2/D ~ 250s ~ 4 min. Cell cycle ~ 15-30 min.

adversarial_critique.name: The dichotomy is anachronistic
adversarial_critique.attack: The lineage-vs-gradient distinction was formulated before modern tools.
adversarial_critique.evidence: Single-cell trajectory analysis shows unexpected clusters.
adversarial_critique.current_status: Moderate concern - should review recent literature.

adversarial_critique.name: Epigenetic memory as the real third alternative
adversarial_critique.attack: Cells may use chromatin states, neither lineage nor gradient.
